name: PeopleConnect
overview:
PeopleConnect is a boutique a full-service executive search firm specializing in the high tech, clean tech, and scientific industries.

Clients include leaders in sound technology, startups with alternative energy solutions, new properties in online gaming and social networking, and companies with biotech breakthroughs and emerging technologies.

PeopleConnect client services include Contingency Plus for full-time placement (no fees charged until the desired person is hired), a unique Employees Without Paychecks program, which places entrepreneurial executives with pre-funded startups on an equity basis, Outsourced Recruiting Solution for companies who need to hire a lot of people in a short period of time and Interim Staffing for venture funded companies.

Senior-level executives, managers and specialists (as well as scientific and specialized technical professionals) are placed in just about any area of a company, including sales, business development, marketing, finance, accounting, IT, and product development.

Jobs titles include CEO, CTO, VP Sales, VP Finance, Director of Marketing, and any other senior or C-level titles, as well as technical and industry-specific senior level jobs. PeopleConnect handles unusual searches, too, and has placed hydrologists, molecular scientists, attorneys, and specialists in rare software development as well.
